Token.Abstract: The PWRouteManeuverOverlayRenderer class draws a map overlay whose shape is represented by the current maneuver for a route.
Initializes and returns the route overlay renderer and associates it with the specified route overlay object.

Parameter.Name: overlay
Parameter.Abstract: The route maneuver overlay to initialize the renderer with. The route overlay contains several important pieces of information the route maneuver renderer needs to draw the route.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The mapView to initiatize the renderer with. The mapView is needed for the renderer to know the current zoom workaround state.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A basic route manuever overlay renderer.
